content:
You find Silaro bent over a flowsteel mirror, a half-disassembled lightbringer beside him. Even as you watch, the mirror ripples. Estian script sinks into the surface, and Silaro grunts and moves something in the machine in response. A small burst of sparks erupts, and he sighs.

"Researching ancient technology is a lot easier when you have years to do it," he says when he notices you. "Hopefully you've been having better luck than I."

Clear Silaro Mako with   to chat with him about what you've discovered.
